title: travelplanner: Please assist in devising a week-long travel plan for a party of 5. We will depart from Marquette with the aim of visiting 3 cities in Michigan between March 6th and March 12th, 2022. Our budget is now set at $14,600. We should emphasize that our accommodations must be suitable for children under 10. (ad2e879c786b3a03)

always_included_messages.content: Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.

chat_history.content: Please assist in devising a week-long travel plan for a party of 5. We will depart from Marquette with the aim of visiting 3 cities in Michigan between March 6th and March 12th, 2022. Our budget is now set at $14,600. We should emphasize that our accommodations must be suitable for children under 10.

function.name: delegate
function.arguments: {"instructions":"Create a week-long travel plan for a party of 5 departing from Marquette and visiting 3 cities in Michigan between March 6th and March 12th, 2022. The budget is $14,600, and accommodations must be suitable for children under 10. Provide details for transportation, breakfast, attractions, lunch, dinner, and accommodation for each day."}

chat_history.content:
### Week-Long Travel Plan for a Party of 5 in Michigan

#### Day 1: March 6, 2022 - Departure from Marquette to Traverse City
- **Transportation**: Self-driving from Marquette to Traverse City
  - **Distance**: Approximately 3 hours and 30 minutes
- **Accommodation**: Upper Westside apt with huge private terrace
  - **Price**: $788 per night
  - **Maximum Occupancy**: 5
  - **House Rules**: No smoking, no parties, no pets
- **Meals**:
  - **Breakfast**: At home before departure
  - **Lunch**: Picnic on the way
  - **Dinner**: Local restaurant in Traverse City

#### Day 2: March 7, 2022 - Traverse City
- **Attractions**: 
  - Visit Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore
  - Explore downtown Traverse City
- **Meals**:
  - **Breakfast**: At the accommodation
  - **Lunch**: Local café in Traverse City
  - **Dinner**: Restaurant in Traverse City

#### Day 3: March 8, 2022 - Traverse City to Grand Rapids
- **Transportation**: Self-driving from Traverse City to Grand Rapids
  - **Distance**: Approximately 2 hours and 30 minutes
- **Accommodation**: Stylish One Bedroom Apartment
  - **Price**: $1124 per night
  - **Maximum Occupancy**: 3 (Book two apartments)
  - **House Rules**: No parties
- **Meals**:
  - **Breakfast**: At the accommodation
  - **Lunch**: On the way
  - **Dinner**: Restaurant in Grand Rapids

#### Day 4: March 9, 2022 - Grand Rapids
- **Attractions**: 
  - Visit Frederik Meijer Gardens & Sculpture Park
  - Explore downtown Grand Rapids
- **Meals**:
  - **Breakfast**: At the accommodation
  - **Lunch**: Local café in Grand Rapids
  - **Dinner**: Restaurant in Grand Rapids

#### Day 5: March 10, 2022 - Grand Rapids to Detroit
- **Transportation**: Self-driving from Grand Rapids to Detroit
  - **Distance**: Approximately 2 hours and 30 minutes
- **Accommodation**: Cozy 1 bedroom in the heart of Fort Greene
  - **Price**: $751 per night
  - **Maximum Occupancy**: 6
  - **House Rules**: No pets, no parties
- **Meals**:
  - **Breakfast**: At the accommodation
  - **Lunch**: On the way
  - **Dinner**: Restaurant in Detroit

#### Day 6: March 11, 2022 - Detroit
- **Attractions**: 
  - Visit Detroit Institute of Arts
  - Explore downtown Detroit
- **Meals**:
  - **Breakfast**: At the accommodation
  - **Lunch**: Local café in Detroit
  - **Dinner**: Restaurant in Detroit

#### Day 7: March 12, 2022 - Return to Marquette
- **Transportation**: Self-driving from Detroit to Marquette
  - **Distance**: Approximately 7 hours
- **Meals**:
  - **Breakfast**: At the accommodation
  - **Lunch**: Picnic on the way
  - **Dinner**: At home

### Budget Breakdown
- **Accommodation**: 
  - Traverse City: $788 x 2 nights = $1576
  - Grand Rapids: $1124 x 2 apartments x 2 nights = $4496
  - Detroit: $751 x 2 nights = $1502
- **Total Accommodation Cost**: $7574
- **Remaining Budget**: $14,600 - $7574 = $7026
- **Meals and Attractions**: Allocate the remaining budget for meals, attractions, and transportation costs.

This plan ensures comfortable accommodations suitable for children under 10 and covers all essential aspects of the trip within the budget.

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").
current_city.title: Current City

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"
transportation.title: Transportation

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"
breakfast.title: Breakfast

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"
attraction.title: Attraction

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
accommodation.title: Accommodation

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.
city.title: City

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.
city.title: City

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.
state.title: State

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.
departure_city.title: Departure City

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.
destination_city.title: Destination City

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.
date.title: Date

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.
origin.title: Origin

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.
destination.title: Destination

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.
city.title: City
